casebody.data:
Leon TAYLOR, petitioner,
v.
George A. LOMBARDI, Director, Missouri Department of Corrections, et al. No. 14-7157 14A532. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 18, 2014.

Opinion

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice ALITO and by him referred to the court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari before judgment to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.

Justice GINSBURG, Justice BREYER, Justice SOTOMAYOR, and Justice KAGANwould grant the application for stay of execution.
